descriptionHtml:
[b][i] [size=14]Introduction[/size][/i][/b]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OSHb1AW.gif[/IMG]

I can\'t speak English well.

This is a conversion of \"SERENITY (ARMOUR OF ETERNAL GLORY)\" in Oblivion mode. 
Original author is Hentai.

This Mod has Serenity Armor & Blade.

[youtube]xTahYApDkug[/youtube]

[youtube]hs95MaM90JY[/youtube]

[youtube]BQM1sILE8wA[/youtube]

[color=yellow]It support HDT\'s Highheel System (HHS).[/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zVmsHyJ.jpg[/IMG]

[b][i] [size=14]Caution[/size][/i][/b]

[color=red]My skyrim version is 1.8.151. I made a esp file with newest CK.[/color]
[color=red]If your version is lower than 1.8, you have nothing in craft list, console(help command).[/color]
[color=red]You must update new version.[/color]

[color=yellow]The hair of my screenshot is limited distribute mode.
I will not answer questions about this.[/color]

[b][i] [size=14]Description[/size][/i][/b]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9a0RJ4d.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9uapZuf.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ENjjJkH.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fZ9bsx2.jpg[/IMG]

[color=yellow]It supports the weight slider.[/color]

Here are armor, glove, boots, helmet, other parts & blade(2H).

These are craftable & smithing at Daedric, DragonScale.
Other parts are craftable at jewelry.
Blade is craftable & smithing at Daedric.

[color=yellow]It support HDT\'s Highheel System (HHS).
HHS is real Highheel system.
Boots are 4 kind.[/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bYGpAzv.jpg[/IMG]

[b][i][size=14][HDT\'s High Heel System (HHS)][/size][/i][/b]

HDT have created a wonderful system, and would like to say thank you.

[color=red]HHS is not essential for this mod.[/color]

HHS is the characters into the air moves vertically.
I was modeling the boots to fit the height.
There are three built-in height to fit 3 types of boots. (8, 11.8, 15)
Adjust the length and height of the boots are provided with regular boots.

[color=yellow]HHS is still in an experimental system.
Yet the big problem is invisible with short test.
Appending a new source to skse_1_8_151.dll(SKSE 1.6.6) was compiled.[/color]

[b][i][size=14][Requirement][/size][/i][/b]
Skyrim 1.8.151 and SKSE 1.6.6 is required.
SKYUI 3.0 or later is required.

[b][i][size=14][Download][/size][/i][/b]
HDT\'s HHS(Chinese) - original : [url=http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-3654925-1-1.html]http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-3654925-1-1.html[/url]

My Mirror :[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?j86g59jwiodm5r9]http://www.mediafire.com/?j86g59jwiodm5r9[/url]

English translate : My Mod files - overwrite to HDT\'s HHS.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/1000006969]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/1000006969[/url]

[b][i][size=14][Install HSS][/size][/i][/b]
1. install SKYUI 3.0 or later
2. install SKSE 1.6.6
3. update Skyrim to 1.8.151
4. Backup your skse_1_8_151.dll (in Skyrim folder)
5. install HHS (It replace your skse_1_8_151.dll)
6. check hdtHighHeel.esm, hdtHighHeelMCM.esp

[b][i][size=14][Usage][/size][/i][/b]
1. The desired height of the boots to wear.
2. Skyrim menu, by launching \"MOD CONFIGURATION\" selection.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/irZlTSX.png[/IMG]
3. Select \"HDT High heel system\".
4. Select height.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pluob1z.png[/IMG]
5. Exit menu. Then Increases the height.
6. If you want to reset the height, Select HHS\'s \"Clear heeled effect\".
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VgX14Ii.png[/IMG]

[b][i] [size=14]Compatibility[/size][/i][/b]

It was created based on CBBE 3.2 default.
It is compatible CBBE3. (If you are CBBE3 user, you will use it without CBBE 3.2 body.)

[b][i] [size=14]Permissions[/size][/i][/b]

You can use freely.

[b][i] [size=14]Credit[/size][/i][/b]

Hentai get all credit for all original resource (mesh, texture & design).
I convert only.

Special thanks to HDT.
author: Nausicaa
